snippet: Iran's judiciary has indicted a member of the country's team that negotiated the nuclear deal with world powers, a spokesman said Sunday, likely an Iranian-Canadian national previously detained by authorities on suspicion of espionage....

headline.main: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol

lead_paragraph: Iran's judiciary has indicted a member of the country's team that negotiated the nuclear deal with world powers, a spokesman said Sunday, likely an Iranian-Canadian national previously detained by authorities on suspicion of espionage.
